Ace.name: Ace
Ace.tips: The main reason you use Ace is because of his defense down passive. He is really sticky due to guts and provides good debuffs for your team.

Alice.name: Alice
Alice.skill_enhance_priority: Not that important overall but the basic attack and passive are both pretty nice
Alice.tips: Defensive healer. Generally used in tank comp. The defense she gives makes a lot of the tanky heroes a lot stronger, especially Platin.

Amelia.name: Amelia
Amelia.tips: S1 concussion is very strong when paired with multi hit heroes. Can infinitely cc 3 enemies.

Aquila.name: Aquila
Aquila.wishlist_priority: Low (high if you're a death comp freak)

T0.name: Spellweaver Physical

T0.main_stats: Max HP % (weapons), Block Rate (armor), All damage reduction (armor)

T0.main_stats: Max HP % (weapons), Block Rate (armor), All damage reduction (armor)
T0.required_stat_thresholds: SPEED, rest not important but 100% block is good if you can get it

Aquila.tips: Want to stack death with Aquila S2 and Kris S2 then proc it with Aquila S1. Leading with S2 is good cause it gives link.

--- TIPS/IMPORTANT INFO ---
Really hard to find perfect gear for her to clear higher levels of Ox. Gotta find the balance between 1 shotting the ads and being tanky enough to live.
Can occasionally be used to counter petrify in any other content (like nightmare 8-30)

Eileene.tips: S2 is really strong. Multi-hit shock. Much stronger when paired with rosie but not necessary. T6 adds 10% x2 chance to hit which is very powerful.

Kris.name: Kris

T0.main_stats: Effect Hit Rate, Defense %, HP %, Block Rate (armors), Damage Reduction (Armors)
T0.sub_stat_priority: Block Rate, Defense %, HP %, Effect Hit

Kyle.name: Kyle
Kyle.tips: Most OP hero in the game. Good in almost all content. Beyond broken for pushing nightmare, tower, arena, total war, etc.

Kyrielle.name: Kyrielle
Kyrielle.primary_content: Arena, GvG, Total War, Advent Expedition

T0.name: Spellweaver Magic
T0.required_stat_thresholds: Sub Stat Priority: Effect Hit Rate, Speed, Crit Rate, Crit Damage, Weakness Hit Chance, All Attack %
T0.sub_stat_priority: Effect Hit Rate, Speed, Crit Rate, Crit Damage, Weakness Hit Chance, All Attack %

T0.name: Spellweaver Magic
T0.required_stat_thresholds: Sub Stat Priority: Speed, Crit Rate, Crit Damage, Weakness Hit Chance, All Attack %
T0.sub_stat_priority: Speed, Crit Rate, Crit Damage, Weakness Hit Chance, All Attack %

Kyrielle.tips: Overall not that great of a hero at lower tiers. Once you get her to T2-T6 she becomes a little bit more of a viable PvP unit. T2 gives her single targert Skill 1 a recast on kill and Skill 2 is a AOE Paralysis. The good thing about this unit is at T6 you dont have to worry about queueing any skills in PvP since she becomes immune to CC. This hero also scales all attack with speed making it a good speed stick as well as good CC.

Vanessa.name: Vanessa
Vanessa.wishlist_priority: Very High (High is you are looking for the best utility unit in the game, the higher transcendence the more utility)
Vanessa.tips: Sandstorm sits at (%70-%80) chance to inflict a skill cooldown increase. This is the highest "CC" ability in the game and Spellweaver set increases probability to (%80-%90). Skill cooldown increase in PvP is an amazing opener as landing any can mess up the enemies queued skills. This unit is very good for magic team compositions and can even be used in some physical teams since her passive gives (%20-%24) defense down.

Yeonhee.tips: Yeonhee is a very strong magic user who can be used in lots of places. She needs 100% crit chance to perform well, substat Crit Damage or Weakness Hit is just bonus damage! She does not have that great of skill enchances nothing to chase over, its better to prioritize other hero skill enhances unless you have most of your important ones out of the way.
